column5: This course covers the fundamentals of Data Science including Big Data infrastructure, AI and statistical analysis and the mining of data. Development of your understanding of deriving value from the data analytics functions is also a focus of this course.You will learn how to support organisations in improving their data capture, management and analysis processes with a focus on efficiency and profit, whilst adhering to the current highest ethical standards.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 2 years part time with 1 year work placement
